author: mvg
msg: Revert typo fix. Wasn't a type after all...

author: stroucki
msg: clustermanagerservice: unhandled failed state transitions will raise exception while holding an instance lock. Wrap state transitions with try / except which will release lock when current state is really necessary. Otherwise just try setting state again, for example in the case of shutdowns when the guest OS ignores the command it gets from the VMM.
qemu: add file descriptor number to error message to see whether it is reading from the correct one.
qemu: arbitrarily set interval between resumption status checks to 60 seconds
qemu: catch exceptions within the resumption status check
nodemanagerservice: add comment on double state update
qemu: let NM know the resume has finished

msg: Create a branch to play with index
